text: The Ohio State Buckeyes women's ice hockey program represented The Ohio State University during the 2014-15 NCAA Division I women's ice hockey season. ==Offseason== *August 12: Sara and Kari Schmitt were invited to participate in the USA Hockey Women’s National Festival in Lake Placid, N.Y. ===Recruiting=== {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="background:#b00; color:white;" | Player || Position ||Nationality || Notes |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Jessica Dunne || Defender ||||Member of Chicago Fury |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Allison Gasuik || Forward ||||Played with the Buffalo Bison |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Selena Hunter || Goaltender || ||Redshirt in 2014-15; attended North American Hockey Academy |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Julianna Iafallo || Forward || || Played with Allison Gasuik in Buffalo |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Alex LaMere|| Goaltender||||2014-15 Redshirt |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Dani Sadek || Defender || || Member of Minnesota Jr. Whitecaps |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |Kassidy Sauve|| Goaltender||||Minded the net for the Whitby Wolves |- align="center" bgcolor="#ccffcc" |Lauren Spring || Forward || || Attended Pursuit of Excellence Academy |- align="center" bgcolor=" " |} ==Roster== ===2014–15 Buckeyes=== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=12 style="background:#b00; color:white;"| Regular Season |- !colspan=12 style="background:#b00; color:white;"| WCHA Tournament ==Awards and honors== *Kassidy Sauve (Goaltender), WCHA All-Rookie Team ==References== Ohio State Category:Ohio State Buckeyes women's ice hockey seasons Ohio State Ohio State Buckeyes Ohio State Buckeyes
title: 2014–15 Ohio State Buckeyes women's ice hockey season
